# Architecture Change Proposal (RFC)

**Target Section in DESIGN.md:**
[e.g., DES-ARCH-05]

## 1. Problem Description
Why is the current architecture insufficient?

## 2. Proposed Change
State the new rule or modification precisely.

## 3. Impact Analysis
- [ ] Does this affect the Frontend?
- [ ] Does this affect the AIP/IPC layer?
- [ ] Does this violate any Higher-Order Governance rules (DES-GOV)?

## 4. Alternatives Considered
What else did you consider?
